question_text: During a laptop rebuild, what two factors must be verified to ensure proper antenna functionality?
answer_options: Antenna cables are routed through the hinge into the lid
The wireless card supports dual-band operation
The antenna wires are connected to the correct terminals (main and aux)
The display uses an IPS panel
The battery is fully charged before boot
correct_answer: Antenna cables are routed through the hinge into the lid
The antenna wires are connected to the correct terminals (main and aux)
explanation: Correct routing and connector alignment are critical to achieving proper signal strength from internal antennas.
